name: Auburn Ruth
scrapedContent:
=== POOL ===
Our multi-activity facility proudly serves Lidcombe, Auburn, and surrounding communities with inclusive aquatic and leisure programs for all ages and abilities. Enjoy a 50-metre Olympic pool with grandstand seating, a 25-metre indoor pool, and a leisure pool with beach-style entry – perfect for fun, fitness, and relaxation. For hydrotherapy, we offer a warm program pool, while children can explore the splash pad and slide. Our leisure and toddler pools help little ones build water confidence, whether with family or through swimming lessons. We also offer a range of health and fitness services, including our Begin program, group exercise classes, and a fully equipped health club. With something for everyone, we’re committed to delivering the best in health, wellness, and leisure. Opening Hours Facilities

=== GYM ===
Prioritise your health and wellbeing in our gym or within one of our exercise programs. Join Us learn more

=== MEMBERSHIP ===

=== POOL ===
Manning Aquatic Centre is your aquatic and leisure facility serving the Bathurst and surrounding community. Our indoor facilities offer you a 25-metre lap swimming pool, program pool, children’s leisure pool with whirlpool and water features for the little ones to enjoy. As well as a spa, sauna and steam room for people over the age of 16 to relax in and enjoy the health benefits.Outdoor facilities include a 50-metre lap swimming pool with shaded grandstand area and a grassed area with picnic tables. This pool is open from October until March each summer season.Manning Aquatic Centre is open seven days a week, and all swimming pools are heated to allow you to enjoy year-round swimming for your health and wellbeing. We look forward to welcoming you to the centre and providing you with the best health and leisure services possible. Opening Hours Facilities

name: Burpengary
scrapedContent:
=== POOL ===
We are proudly managed by Belgravia Leisure on behalf of the City of Moreton Bay. Serving the Burpengary community and surrounding areas, our multi-activity facility offers inclusive access to swimming, fitness, and recreational programs for people of all ages and abilities. Our centre features a wide range of amenities for the whole family, including a 50-metre indoor pool, a 25-metre hydrotherapy pool, an outdoor mushroom pool, and our exciting new splash pad — now open! Stay active in our fully equipped gym, offering over 40 group exercise classes each week, plus access to personal trainers. We also offer GOswim lessons, squad swimming, tennis courts, BBQ facilities, and a welcoming on-site café. Opening Hours Facilities

=== GYM ===
Fully equipped gym with weights area, cardio equipment, functional zone, group exercise studio and stretching area. learn more

scrapedContent:

=== POOL ===
Canberra Olympic Pool features a range of fitness and aquatic facilities to cater for the needs of the Canberra community all year round! Facilities include an indoor 50m Olympic pool, fully equipped health club and Group Fitness Classes. Over the warmer months our outdoor pools will open featuring a toddler pool and dive pool with a 1m, 3m and 10m* board! Canberra Olympic Pool offers all year round GOswim swimming and water safety lessons for students aged 6 months to adults. We believe learning to swim important and encourage all our community members to learn a skill for life. *Please note our 10m board is for club use only, and not available for public use.

=== GYM ===
Our fully equipped gym has something for all ages and abilities. With access to cardio, weights and stretching areas plus group fitness classes.

name: Civic Reserve
scrapedContent: 03 8727 8990 DOWNLOAD ACTIVEWORLD APP Group Fitness Timetable Venue Entry Fees Opening Hours Cafe Accessibility & Inclusion Facility Hire News/Blog Frequently Asked Questions Close Train CONNECT30 Exercise Physiology Group Fitness Health Club Memberships and Passes Introductory Program Personal Training Older Adults Close Play Social Sports Badminton Basketball Netball Court Hire Learn to Play Programs Inclusive Programs Pickleball School Holiday Activities Close Join Member Benefits Memberships and Passes Your Membership App Free 1 Day Trial Close Contact Us Get in Touch Getting to Civic Reserve Manage My Membership Visit Our Other Centres Careers Close Search Search Search Home Welcome to Civic Reserve Recreation Centre ANNUAL VENUE CLOSURE Civic Reserve Recreation Centre will be closed for annual maintenance from Wednesday 17 December to Sunday 28 December. Throughout the closure, all Wellness, Premier, Premier Staying Active & Teen members can still enjoy health club, group fitness and aquatic access across three Mornington Peninsula Aquatic & Recreation venues during this time: Pelican Park Recreation Centre, Hastings Yawa Aquatic Centre, Rosebud Crib Point Outdoor Pool, Crib Point Loading... Learn More Loading... Civic Reserve Recreation Centre The Hub for Mornington Peninsula Sports, Fitness and Recreation. Learn More Welcome to Civic Reserve Recreation Centre Located within the picturesque Civic Reserve Mornington, Civic Reserve Recreation Centre is an inclusive venue hosting a boutique gymnasium, group exercise studio, wellness classes, two court multi-sport stadium facility and a range of different services, including personal training and kiosk facilities. The venue is also home of the Mornington Youth Club Gymnastics, Mornington Peninsula Table Tennis Association and Mornington Tennis Club. This multi-activity regional venue serves the Mornington community and surrounding suburbs catering for the inclusion of people of all ages and abilities. With something for everyone to enjoy, we look forward to providing you with our best health and leisure services possible. Opening Hours* Monday to Friday 8.00am - 9.00pm Gym Hours 8.00am - 9.00pm Saturday 8.00am - 5.00pm Gym Hours 8.00am - 12.00pm Sunday 9.00am - 1.00pm Gym Hours 9.00am - 1.00pm *subject to change based on facility bookings Bookings are required for group fitness classes via our Active World App with capacity limits applicable. This includes all Members, Multi Visit Pass Holders & Casual Visitors. Become a Member As a Civic Reserve member, you will have access to ongoing support from our team who will provide the support and motivation needed to help you reach your wellness goals and supporting a happier, more active lifestyle. Member Benefits Memberships & Passes Latest News VIEW ALL NEWS 10 Oct 25 World Mental Health Day! World Mental Health Day is observed on 10 October each year as a global movement to raise awareness, reduce stigma, and encourage positive action for mental wellbeing. The day invites communities, workplaces, schools, and individuals to pause, reflect, and act in ways that strengthen social connection and mental health. Read more 01 Sep 25 Say Yes to You: Make Time to Move It's Women’s Health Week 2025! Whether small or bold, every choice to move supports your physical, mental, and social wellbeing. Read more about the health tips to follow this week from our Group Health and Wellbeing Manager, Victoria Goodwin-Barlow, and our Allied Health Manager, Kia Naylor. Read More 04 Aug 25 Loneliness Awareness Week 2025 Loneliness Awareness Week, from Ending Loneliness Together, shines a spotlight on the shared experience of loneliness and calls on all Australians, including individuals, communities, workplaces, education, and government, to take action to reduce loneliness and create more opportunities for meaningful social connections Read More 14 Jun 25 How you can embrace active wellbeing this Global Wellness Day Our individual health and wellbeing are paramount to enjoying a fulfilled life alongside our loved ones, engaging in countless valuable experiences to remember. This Global Wellness Day, we’re taking a closer look at how being more active, no matter your circumstance or ability, can positively boost your health and enjoyment of life. Read More Like us on our Facebook page & stay up to date with the latest news! === POOL ===
Using the resistance of water automatically increases the intensity of your workout, helping to increase your strength, flexibility and your overall health. Aqua Aerobics Timetable

=== GYM ===
As the flagship leisure centre for our region, Gympie ARC provides a wide range of high quality health and leisure services for our local community, as well as our larger region. Programs provide access to swimming lessons for all ages, squad and group fitness sessions (aqua and land based). We are home to a 25m indoor heated pool, and a seasonal eight-lane 50m outdoor olympic pool. Our venue also includes a fully equipped gym, childrens splash park, function room, seasonal water slides, kiosk, and BBQ area, all set in beautiful and accessible garden surrounds. Our team looks forward to welcoming you to Gympie ARC, and providing you with the best health and leisure experience possible.

=== OPENINGHOURS ===

name: Kurri Kurri
scrapedContent:
=== FACILITIES ===
Offering something for everyone! Kurri Kurri Aquatic & Fitness Centre is the perfect place to relax, play or get into shape. Learn More

=== POOL ===
Kurri Kurri Aquatic & Fitness Centre is the premier gym and indoor swimming pool in Kurri Kurri. Proudly managed on behalf of Cessnock City Council by Belgravia Leisure. Our modern facility is staffed by a fantastic team of friendly, committed and qualified professionals to assist you in all your Aquatic, Exercise and Customer Service needs. With our heated indoor 25 metre lap pool and 10m heated leisure pool we offer a "year round" swimming lessons program catered for infants from 6 months of age, pre-school and school age lessons, stroke development and squad training, through to adult lessons and disability/special needs swimming lessons by fully qualified professionals. We offer a boutique gym experience with peronalised service and friendly qualified staff. Our centre offers a range of Dryland group fitness programs as well as Aquatic group fitness programs. One of our strengths is personal training - so if you're looking for a little more one on one assistance from a trainer, Kurri Kurri Aquatic & Fitness Centre is the place for you. It's a great place to bring the kids for some awesome fun. Catch up with friends and family whilst you have a BBQ and a swim or just have a coffee and a chat. Contact Us

=== GYM ===
Kurri Kurri Aquatic & Fitness Centre is the premier gym and indoor swimming pool in Kurri Kurri. Proudly managed on behalf of Cessnock City Council by Belgravia Leisure. Our modern facility is staffed by a fantastic team of friendly, committed and qualified professionals to assist you in all your Aquatic, Exercise and Customer Service needs. With our heated indoor 25 metre lap pool and 10m heated leisure pool we offer a "year round" swimming lessons program catered for infants from 6 months of age, pre-school and school age lessons, stroke development and squad training, through to adult lessons and disability/special needs swimming lessons by fully qualified professionals. We offer a boutique gym experience with peronalised service and friendly qualified staff. Our centre offers a range of Dryland group fitness programs as well as Aquatic group fitness programs. One of our strengths is personal training - so if you're looking for a little more one on one assistance from a trainer, Kurri Kurri Aquatic & Fitness Centre is the place for you. It's a great place to bring the kids for some awesome fun. Catch up with friends and family whilst you have a BBQ and a swim or just have a coffee and a chat. Contact Us

scrapedContent:

This outdoor pool offers a 33 metre lap/recreational pool; a smaller learn-to-swim and children’s pool; plus a toddlers’ splash pool. The kiosk offers drinks, treats and ice-creams and parents can relax with a book on the shaded grass area while the kids enjoy the water. Mansfield Swimming Pool has a range of programs to cater to the needs of our community. We offer you Birthday Parties, Holiday Learn to Swim Lessons, and family swimming! These are all features of our family-friendly facility. There are also onsite showers, toilets and change rooms available to visitors. The pool is open from November to March.

name: Moree
scrapedContent:
=== FACILITIES ===
Train with new state of the art equipment. Each entry includes access to the outdoor aquatic facilities. Fitness Passport accepted here! Learn More Fitness Passport

=== POOL ===
The Moree Artesian Aquatic Centre is nature's magic at work! The Moree Artesian aquatic centre is the region's premier health and wellness centre. Home to Artesian water, it attracts both domestic and international travellers that come for the healing properties of the water. Open all year round as a family friendly facility that welcomes all. The benefits of natural artesian mineral waters were discovered thousands of years ago and have been used for their curative powers since ancient times. Many European cities are steeped in spa culture and their residents use thermal spas for their therapeutic value. Today, you don't have to go to Europe to enjoy these health benefits, for this can be experienced in the beautiful township of Moree. Moree Artesian Aquatic Centre also offers a updated gym, Group Fitness Memberships and so much more! Fitness Passport is also accepted at Moree Artesian Aquatic Centre, find out more here.

=== GYM ===
Train with new state of the art equipment. Each entry includes access to the outdoor aquatic facilities. Fitness Passport accepted here! Learn More Fitness Passport

Read on to learn more about safe swimming surroundings.

name: Portland
scrapedContent:
=== CLASSES ===
Thank you to all our members who very generously contributed to our feedback form, to help create a new group fitness timetable, that will be live from July 1st 2024! Check out our new classes! Click here for the latest Group Fitness Timetable!

=== POOL ===
The Portland Leisure and Aquatic Centre (PLACE) aims to provide an enjoyable experience for the whole community, both members or guests to participate and use any of our services, programs and activities. We offer the largest Swimming and Water Safety program in the area helping kids Learn to Swim all year round. The Health Club has a large gym facility which is fully equipped with a variety of weights, machines and cardio equipment. We pride ourselves with our Group Fitness offering, hosting 8 Auqa classes, 18 Reformer Pilates classes and 37 other mixed classes a week. That's a total of 63 classes a week!! PLACE has something for the whole family to enjoy, whether it be a leisurely day around one of our five swimming pools or enjoying coffee at the Café after your workout. We look forward to offering you the best health and leisure experience possible. Come in and visit us today to see what PLACE has to offer you!

=== CLASSES ===
When Rita Popowski first stepped into the pool at Smithton Wellbeing Indoor Recreation & Leisure (SWIRL) in 2022, she was managing arthritis in her left leg and was almost reliant on a walker. Today, at 83, she’s lifting weights, attending Senior Strength classes and inspiring everyone around her.

=== POOL ===
Our multi-activity facility serves the Devonport community and surrounding areas, offering a variety of programs and access to group exercise, dance, and other amenities that cater to people of all ages and abilities. Designed for the whole family, our facility features a range of facilities including an 8-lane, 25m indoor pool, an 8-lane, 50m outdoor pool, a warm water therapy/indoor learn-to-swim pool, an outdoor learn-to-swim pool, a waterslide, and a newly refurbished health club. name: Summit
scrapedContent:
=== POOL ===
Summit Aquatic and Leisure is now open! Our multi-activity facility has been built to serve Mount Barker and the Adelaide Hills to build a healthier, more active community – one swim, one step, one smile at a time. Summit Aquatic and Leisure offers a 25m indoor pool, warm water pool and learn to swim pool as well as a group exercise studio and 24/7 gym. At Summit Aquatic and Leisure you’ll additionally find a range of amenities for the whole family to enjoy, that cater to the inclusion of people of all ages and abilities. Find Your Balance. Find Your People. Find Your Summit. Join Us Our Facilities

name: Swan Hill
scrapedContent:
=== FACILITIES ===
Our aquatic facilities range from the 25-metre, six lane swimming pool to our toddler splash pool for the little ones to enjoy. Learn More

=== POOL ===
Swan Hill Aquatic & Recreation Centre is the premier gym and indoor swimming pool in Swan Hill. We offer you a fully-equipped health club, an all-year-round indoor heated 25-metre lap swimming pool, toddler pool, stadium PLUS our brand new Reformer Pilates studio. We offer range of programs to help you get active your way. Choose from a range of Group Fitness classes from your favourite Les Mills classes to our relaxing pilates classes or dive in to try Aqua Aerobics. Our trainers are here to help you every step of the way, book in for a program review or secure a session with one of our Personal Trainers. We believe that swimming is an essential skill for life, we run GOswim Swimming and Water Safety lessons for students from 6 months all the way to adults. Progress your love for swimming into our squads program or join us for your daily laps. However you choose to get active - we are hear to support you on your health & wellbeing journey. Your NEW Swan Hill Aquatic & Recreation Centre We are excited to unveil our recent facility upgrades with our brand new Health Club and Reformer Pilates Studio now OPEN! Opening Hours Monday - Thursday: 6am - 9pm Friday: 6am - 7pm Saturday: 8am - 5pm Sunday: 10am - 5pm Public Holidays: 8am - 6pm Pool Hours Monday - Thursday: 6am - 8pm Friday: 6am - 7pm Saturday: 8am - 5pm Sunday: 10am - 5pm Public Holidays: 8am - 6pm **PLEASE NOTE** Pool is closed to the public 11am - 3pm during School Terms Our brand new health club is opening soon with 350m2 of space, new equipment and new group fitness classes added to our timetable! learn more If you're looking for a little more one on one assistance from a personal trainer, Swan Hill Aquatic & Recreation Centre is the place for you to achieve your overall health and wellness goals. learn more GOswim Swimming & Water Safety Lessons are held year-round and commence with babies from 6 months of age through to adults. learn more Become a Member Take your first steps with a Free Guest Pass and se

Monday - Thursday: 6am - 8pm Friday: 6am - 7pm Saturday: 8am - 5pm Sunday: 10am - 5pm Public Holidays: 8am - 6pm **PLEASE NOTE**

name: TRAC
scrapedContent:
=== POOL ===
Our multi-activity facility serves the Thomastown community and surrounds, offering programs and access to aquatics and sports programs and facilities, catering to the inclusion of people of all ages and abilities. Our facility provides a range of amenities for the whole family to enjoy. The indoor multipurpose facility includes a court indoor sports hall to accommodate basketball, badminton, volleyball and indoor futsal, as well as an indoor 25 metre lap pool, warm water pool, learn to swim pool, toddlers pool with a waterslide, sauna, steam room, spa, gym, and group exercise including Reformer Pilates. We also have an outdoor water park with great activities for the kids, complete with BBQ facilities.Opening HoursApril to OctoberMonday – Thursday: 6:00am – 10:00pmFriday: 6:00am – 9.30pmSaturday & Sunday: 8:00am – 6:00pmOctober to April Monday – Thursday: 6:00am – 10:00pmFriday: 6:00am – 9.30pmSaturday & Sunday: 8:00am – 8:00pm View our public holiday opening hours here Opening Hours Facilities

name: Tomaree
scrapedContent:
=== FACILITIES ===
The centre features a 50m outdoor heated pool with up to 8 swimming lanes, shaded heated program/kids pool, shaded wading pool, spiral waterslide. Learn More

=== CLASSES ===
Aqua aerobics classes are a great way to stay fit without aggravation or risking injury. Learn More Timetable

=== POOL ===
Tomaree Aquatic Centre is proudly managed by Belgravia Leisure on behalf of Port Stephens council. The centre features a 50m outdoor heated pool with up to 8 swimming lanes, shaded heated program/kids pool, shaded wading pool, spiral waterslide, large open lawned areas, free BBQ's and volleyball greens. At Tomaree Aquatic Centre, we offer a variety of activites from water based to land based! Ranging from Group Fitness Aqua aerobics classes and Functional Fitness classes to swimming lessons and squad training, swimming club and volleyball! Whether you are needing an energy boost or your little ones need refueling, our kiosk staff can help satisfy even the hungriest of appetites! With great food, drinks and icecreams, there is something for everyone! Including a range of swimwear and swimming accessories conveniently located just outside of the kiosk!

=== GYM ===
Getting started can be daunting and our popular group fitness classes are a great way to help build your confidence. Learn More

=== CONTACT ===
3 Aquatic Close, SALAMANDER BAY - 2317 02 4981 2848

Yawa is a place to blow our first bubbles. A place to ease our aches and pains. A place to share a coffee. A place to touch our toes. A place to raise our heart rate, and a place to calm it down. Yawa is a place for everyone. Yawa Aquatic Centre is located in Rosebud on the Mornington Peninsula and is your state of the art recreational centre offering a range of year-round aquatic, leisure and wellness programs for people of all ages and abilities.
